CREATOR.TITLE: CREATOR

TEXTS.1: Your account has not been approved.
TEXTS.2: We are unable to accept your recent referral application:
TEXTS.3: - An additional form of ID is currently required (preferably: foreign passport with English letters)
TEXTS.4: . Please note the possible requirements that must be met for ANY uploaded photo:
TEXTS.5: 1. Images cannot be cropped or resized;
TEXTS.6: 2. All images must be in color;
TEXTS.7: 3. The proposed documents must be in the form of photographs or scanned copies. Electronic documents or photographs photographs will
TEXTS.10: 5. All issued, unexpired ID must be presented. No parts of the document can be edited,
TEXTS.12: 6. Files must be in .PNG or .JPG format and no larger than 7 MB;
TEXTS.13: Please note: If the documents you submit are not covered by ALL of the templates above, your application will not be
TEXTS.14: processed and additional documents will be requested. This review keeps your applications for 24-48 hours.
